title: Crushing Thunder
story: The storm outside is deafening, its fury amplified by the castle's ancient stones. The heroes feel an immense pressure building, threatening to shatter their resolve.
effect: All heroes immediately lose 1 Sanity and 1 Willpower. If Lord Godalming is in the Great Hall or Ballroom, he must also discard his Wooden Club, as the immense force of the storm shatters it against the stone floor.
